years. The replacement is more about streamlining operations at Google. ''Larry, Sergey Brin , and I spent a lot of time talking about how to run everything,'' Eric Schmidt said during the call. After a long series of conversations, we decided to make some changes in the way we are structured and the way we operate things. Historically, we've always been running the decisions together, and ultimately, it adds delay.
